Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We have yet to receive the supporting materials for your application to Handmade® Designer Maker. Please note we will be unable to review your application with the selection committee after the March 30th deadline.
As a reminder, the selection committee requires that you mail the following materials to be received in our office to support your online application:We ask that you send the following materials for review:
• Designer bio/company statement​
• Specific information on where, by whom and how products are designed and made
• Catalog/brochure with wholesale pricing
• Booth display photo/rendering
• Sample list of customers
All applications should be mailed to the following address:
Emerald Expositions ATTN: Designer Maker 1133 Westchester Avenue, Suite N210 White Plains, NY 10604-3547
Should you have any further questions, please feel free to contact us. Otherwise, we look forward to receiving your application! ​ Sincerely,
NY NOW
